message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.CL 

The paper deals with computer vision challenges of scene text detection and recognition, which are primarily addressed in the computer vision (cs.CV) sub-category. The paper also proposes an innovative image synthesis technique that composes annotated training images, which is related to deep learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) sub-categories. The technique involves semantic coherence and appearance adaptation, which are related to information retrieval (cs.IR) and computational linguistics (cs.CL) sub-categories.
